courseSectionInformation: Credit is not given for JOUR 340 if credit for JOUR 440 has been earned. Prerequisite: JOUR 335.
description: Introduces news studio and field production and principles of field reporting and editing of news video; principles of planning, producing, and directing news and public affairs programs. Credit is not given for JOUR 340 if credit for JOUR 440 has been earned. Prerequisite: JOUR 335.
label: Video Reporting & Storytelling
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Agr & Environmental Cmc & Educ or Journalism or Broadcast Journalism or Agricultural Communications major(s). Restricted to students with Junior or Senior class standing.
